Package ch.hszt.connectfour.control

Contains the controller and logic implementation of the game.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
GameController Handles and delegates communication between GUI and underlying model.
GameEngine Encapsulates all the relevant game logic.
GameObserver This class acts as main observer of the Game and is notified about changes within the associated Game.
GameStatisticUpdateTask Represents the periodically executed task of updating the GameStatistic
 

Package ch.hszt.connectfour.control Description

Contains the controller and logic implementation of the game. The control layer abstracts the game logic totally from the user interface. The design shall allow completely exchanging the user interface without touching the game logic.
